name: DinoSoccer
description:
Do you have what it takes to score THAT ONE GOAL, whilst being a dinosaur?

DinoSoccer is a 2.5D casual game where you play as a cute dinosaur. You and your buddy found a soccer field all for yourselves but you don't know how to play. You just have to score that one goal before your buddy to win the match.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys or Joy Stick 1 to move.
  • R to reset.

Credits

  • Soccer field : Vectors by Vecteezy
  • Dino spritesheets: arks
  • Reset button: adwitr
  • BGM:  void1gaming
  • Font: Kenney
